001
002package com.commercetools.api.models;
003
004import static java.lang.String.format;
005import static java.util.Arrays.asList;
006import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
007
008import java.text.Normalizer;
009import java.util.*;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011import java.util.stream.Stream;
012
013import org.apache.commons.lang3.RandomStringUtils;
014
015final public class InternalUtils {
016    private static final int MAX_SLUG_LENGTH = 256;
017
018    private InternalUtils() {
019    }
020
021    public static <T> String join(final List<T> list) {
022        return list.stream().map(i -> i.toString()).collect(joining(", "));
023    }
024
025    public static <T> List<T> immutableCopyOf(final List<T> list) {
026        return Collections.unmodifiableList(new ArrayList<>(list));
027    }
028
029    @SafeVarargs
030    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
031    public static <T> List<T> asImmutableList(final T... elements) {
032        return Collections.unmodifiableList(asList(elements));
033    }
034
035    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
036    public static <T> List<T> listOf(final T element, final T[] array) {
037        final List<T> result = new ArrayList<>(1 + array.length);
038        result.add(element);
039        result.addAll(asList(array));
040        return result;
041    }
042
043    public static <T> List<T> listOf(final List<T> elements, final T element) {
044        final List<T> result = new ArrayList<>(1 + elements.size());
045        result.addAll(elements);
046        result.add(element);
047        return result;
048    }
049
050    public static <T> List<T> listOf(List<? extends T> first, List<? extends T> second) {
051        final List<T> result = new ArrayList<>(second.size() + first.size());
052        result.addAll(first);
053        result.addAll(second);
054        return result;
055    }
056
057    public static <T> List<T> reverse(final List<T> list) {
058        final ArrayList<T> result = new ArrayList<>(list);
059        Collections.reverse(result);
060        return result;
061    }
062
063    @SafeVarargs
064    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
065    public static <T> Set<T> asSet(final T... params) {
066        return new LinkedHashSet<>(asList(params));
067    }
068
069    public static <T> Set<T> setOf(final T element, final Set<T> set) {
070        final Set<T> result = new HashSet<>(1 + set.size());
071        result.add(element);
072        result.addAll(set);
073        return result;
074    }
075
076    public static <T> Set<T> setOf(final Set<T> first, final Set<T> second) {
077        final Set<T> result = new HashSet<>(first.size() + second.size());
078        result.addAll(first);
079        result.addAll(second);
080        return result;
081    }
082
083    public static <T> Set<T> setOf(final T element, final T[] array) {
084        return setOf(element, asSet(array));
085    }
086
087    public static String slugifyUnique(final String s) {
088        final String postFix = "-" + RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(8);
089        final String intermediate = slugify(s);
090        final String result = intermediate.substring(0,
091            Math.min(intermediate.length(), MAX_SLUG_LENGTH - postFix.length())) + postFix;
092        return result;
093    }
094
095    public static String slugify(final String s) {
096        //algorithm used in https://github.com/slugify/slugify/blob/master/core/src/main/java/com/github/slugify/Slugify.java
097        final String intermediateResult = Normalizer.normalize(s, Normalizer.Form.NFD)
098                .replaceAll("[^\\p{ASCII}]", "")
099                .replaceAll("[^-_a-zA-Z0-9]", "-")
100                .replaceAll("\\s+", "-")
101                .replaceAll("[-]+", "-")
102                .replaceAll("^-", "")
103                .replaceAll("-$", "")
104                .toLowerCase();
105        return intermediateResult.substring(0, Math.min(MAX_SLUG_LENGTH, intermediateResult.length()));
106    }
107
108    public static <K, V, E extends Throwable> V getOrThrow(final Map<K, V> map, final K key,
109            Supplier<E> exceptionSupplier) throws E {
110        if (map.containsKey(key)) {
111            return map.get(key);
112        }
113        else {
114            throw exceptionSupplier.get();
115        }
116    }
117
118    public static <K, V> Map<K, V> immutableCopyOf(final Map<K, V> map) {
119        return Collections.unmodifiableMap(copyOf(map));
120    }
121
122    public static <K, V> Map<K, V> copyOf(final Map<K, V> map) {
123        final Map<K, V> copy = new LinkedHashMap<>();
124        copy.putAll(map);
125        return copy;
126    }
127
128    public static <K, V> Map<K, V> mapOf(final K key, final V value) {
129        final Map<K, V> result = new LinkedHashMap<>();
130        result.put(key, value);
131        return result;
132    }
133
134    public static <K, V> Map<K, V> mapOf(final K key1, final V value1, final K key2, final V value2) {
135        if (key1.equals(key2)) {
136            throw new IllegalArgumentException(format("Duplicate keys (%s) for map creation.", key1));
137        }
138        final Map<K, V> result = new LinkedHashMap<>();
139        result.put(key1, value1);
140        result.put(key2, value2);
141        return result;
142    }
143
144    public static boolean isEmpty(final Iterable<?> iterable) {
145        return !iterable.iterator().hasNext();
146    }
147
148    public static <T> Iterable<T> requireNonEmpty(final Iterable<T> iterable) {
149        if (isEmpty(iterable)) {
150            throw new IllegalArgumentException("iterable must not be empty.");
151        }
152        return iterable;
153    }
154
155    public static <T> List<T> toList(final Iterable<T> iterable) {
156        List<T> list = new ArrayList<>();
157        for (final T item : iterable) {
158            list.add(item);
159        }
160        return list;
161    }
162
163    public static <T> Stream<T> toStream(final Iterable<T> iterable) {
164        return toList(iterable).stream();
165    }
166}
